lexUnit.name: under investigation.prep
lexUnit.definition: FN: be the subject of a (criminal) investigation.

sentence.text: According to a government communiqué after the coup attempt , Gen. Marcos Zarate Rota , the commander of the army , had also been involved in the conspiracy and was under investigation for drug trafficking .
Mr Erich Honecker , aged 77 , the disgraced former party chief , is among six ex-politburo members now under investigation for abuse of office , corruption and personal enrichment .
His former boss , Alexander Schalck-Golodkowski , who fled abroad last week after he came under investigation for fraud , gave himself up yesterday in West Berlin , police said .
According to the Far Eastern Economic Review of Feb. 1 , 1990 , more than 3,500 officers were under investigation for suspected involvement in the pro-democracy movement .
De Lorenzo , a Liberal who is under investigation for vote-rigging , quit after the arrest of his father on an unrelated corruption charge .
THE DEATH of two Royal Marines from 45 Commando , based in Arbroath , while on a Arctic training exercise in Norway , was under investigation by the Ministry of Defence last night .

The Chief of Federal Police , Romeu Tuma , who was under investigation by the military police allegedly for favouring smugglers shipping coffee into Paraguay , announced on April 1 that he intended to resign .
Two company directors and a company were under investigation by the Customs and Excise Commissioners regarding possible offences against the Exchange Control Act 1947 .
The big dealers are really being hit as some have been under investigation for almost a year and have had their passports confiscated .
BARNET and Liverpool are among several clubs under investigation over the appearance of black-market tickets for last season 's FA Cup final .
We have one possibility but the case is still under investigation and I am looking for possible motives .
Like the rip-offs in rubbish collection and fish transport , these charges are under investigation .
Yet on May 18th , two more Olivetti executives were put under investigation and questioned in Milan .
Hunt , a part-time preacher , had also been under investigation for using state-owned aircraft for profit-making preaching trips , but was understood not to have ben charged in relation to this .
A rave party organiser is under investigation after a legal event left one man dead and another in a coma .

Carlo De Benedetti , the chairman of Olivetti , was placed under investigation after he revealed that his electronics and office-equipment firm had bribed politicians in Italy to win public-works contracts .
In 1988 the applicant was charged with six other offences , and in 1989 with two further offences which had been under investigation since 1983 .
At the time , the force declined to name the five cases under investigation .
In May and June 1988 all eight officers under investigation were interviewed under caution .
